title: Who won the best album of the year 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it’s Thriller by Michael Jackson? Why not just ask google that question. Not sure if you meant 2020 specifically. I personally dislike modern pop so I don’t check out stuff like that. In terms of new music I’m all about the obscure rock, jazz, metal, and classical music. Even more obscure hip pop is better than popular rap now
everyone has a taste tho. 2020 is not done yet so there is no #1 album yet.
